titles.title: Honoring William "Bill" Clifton France, the former president, chief executive officer, and chairman of NASCAR, for his lifetime of contributions and dedication to motorsports.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 6/18/2007--Introduced. Honors William Clifton France, the former president, chief executive officer, and chairman of NASCAR, for his lifetime of contributions and dedication to motorsports.
